name: Jinsei Game for Nintendo Switch
summary:
Create your own avatar, refine its parameters and grow yourself! The jobs you can get will change depending on the parameters!
There are various jobs, such as office workers and doctors, which automatically rank up if you meet certain conditions, and baseball players and idols, which rank up by successfully playing roulette.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: 人生ゲーム for Nintendo Switch [Nintendo Direct 2023.6.21]
